TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void ExportEventHandler(object sender, ReportExportEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed ExportEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

Docs.summary: Represents the method that will handle the <xref:Microsoft.ReportingServices.WinForms.ReportViewer.Export> event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
